code: @Test public void testTryCatchMustHaveExceptionConfigured() throws Exception {     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:a").doTry().to("mock:b").throwException(new IllegalArgumentException("Damn")).doCatch().to("mock:catch").end().         }     }).     try {         context.start().         fail("Should throw exception").     } catch (FailedToCreateRouteException e) {         assertIsInstanceOf(IllegalArgumentException.class, e.getCause()).         assertEquals("At least one Exception must be configured to catch", e.getCause().getMessage()).     } }
